name: Smartphone Simulator
description:
Simulator have:

 Phones:

- Samsung Galaxy J5 2016

- Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini (temporarily disabled)

Recovery:

- TWRP for J5 2016 (not completed)

- Stock recovery for S3 Mini (not completed, working buttons are reboot to system and power off)

Systems:

- System for J5 2016 (not completed, only boot animation)

Other:

- Download mode for J5 2016 (ODIN mode)

Recommended screen resolution - 1920x1080
